channel.title: Shyness
channel.description:
I'm having a problem , basically im too shy.Whenever im somewhere with lots of people i suddenly dont know what to say and i just feel like saying nothing. This is really ruining my life, and i need some help too overcome my shyness (if possible). Because of my shyness i started drinking allot of alcohol to temporary get rid of shyness. But drinking so much alcohol isnt good for my health so i need another solution ( a permanent solution)
Now can anyone help me overcoming shyness? discuss shyness here and write some possibilities to overcome it.
Thank you
EDIT: oh yes i forgot to say please dont post dumbass things like Io9 did, Thank you

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

MybJames:

zach, isn’t it good to have a deeper voice, if they tease you, you just tell them that they have no pubes.

You’re right, but in elementary school I didn’t thing of that, and now it’s pretty much a habit.

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @wall_of_fir wall of fir
item.description:
@wall_of_fir wrote:

I’d say…practice, I mean dont practice, but when youre confronted, just try to work on it every time, i was shy too, now i get suspended for telling my principal to shutup.

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @drgn24b drgn24b
item.description:
@drgn24b wrote:

i can still sometimes feel shy even when talking to a girl on msn

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @The_Cursed The Cursed
item.description:
@The_Cursed wrote:

[quote=“Secet, post:45, topic:63809”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=92414.msg975159#msg975159 date=1173131876]
I used to be shy as fuck. All you gotta do, is stay with your true friends, and then there’s no reason to be shy.

When your approaching girls, that’s a different matter. You don’t have to be overly confident to meet one, all it needs is a smile when you walk passed. That’s what brought me to my first love.
[/quote]

He said it.

And when approaching girls and you feel shy, try to speak with just one girl at the time and it will go just fine. :)[/quote]
i spoke to 2 girls at a time today and didnt feel awkward at all
i dont know, il see tommorow if i still act the same way and if i do, then maybe my shyness is gone?

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:40, topic:63809”]I used to be shy as fuck. All you gotta do, is stay with your true friends, and then there’s no reason to be shy.

When your approaching girls, that’s a different matter. You don’t have to be overly confident to meet one, all it needs is a smile when you walk passed. That’s what brought me to my first love.[/quote]

He said it.

And when approaching girls and you feel shy, try to speak with just one girl at the time and it will go just fine.

Read full topic

You know your shy when you feel awkward talking to somebody when it’s really, in all reality not awkward.

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @The_Cursed The Cursed
item.description:
@The_Cursed wrote:

Thanks for the advice people but i dont know if im shy or not??
i’m really confused now and dont know if im shy, cause i talked to allot of people today
and i was pretty social and such.

i dont know…

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

You’ll see me about now and then. Not as much as you used to

Yeh, most of the girls I know, hate it when boys go ‘Hey sexy/babe/hunny’ or whatever. I know you’ll hear this a lot, but it really works: Be yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:40, topic:63809”]I used to be shy as fuck. All you gotta do, is stay with your true friends, and then there’s no reason to be shy.

When your approaching girls, that’s a different matter. You don’t have to be overly confident to meet one, all it needs is a smile when you walk passed. That’s what brought me to my first love.[/quote]
MR CHRIS! I haven’t seen you in a while.

Anyhow if you’re confident when talking to girls they seem to pick up on it and like it, just don’t be over confident. (just adding to Mr. Chris’ post)

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I used to be shy as fuck. All you gotta do, is stay with your true friends, and then there’s no reason to be shy.

When your approaching girls, that’s a different matter. You don’t have to be overly confident to meet one, all it needs is a smile when you walk passed. That’s what brought me to my first love.

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

As others said, wait and you will grow out of it. And I’m sure your friends understand that some people are shy and won’t make a big deal about it. If they laugh or something,
a) They are retards
b) They are not your friends

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

I used to be like that until eventually I just learned not to give a fuck about whether other people think I’m being a jackass or dumb ass. Simply put you need to learn not to care about that shit, the only peoples opinions that matter should be the ones of people close to you and if they’re good friends they won’t hold anything you say/do against you.

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

[quote=“The Cursed, post:12, topic:63809”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=92414.msg965540#msg965540 date=1172976757]
You will grow out of it, I did.

Moving this to general discussion.
[/quote]
when exactly will i grow out of it?[/quote]

There is no set time, you just have to wait. I suggest not missing up a chance to do group things with your friends or family.

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @Portal Portal
item.description:
@Portal wrote:

I think guys are only shy if they have a small penis usually… and even if you do, this will make you get over your shyness: go in the middle of a crowd one day and just drop your pants. Once they have seen it you will never have something to be shy about again lmao. Basically its if you have the balls to do that amongst your peers you could talk to anyone about anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @drgn24b drgn24b
item.description:
@drgn24b wrote:

i always think that i am either going to say the wrong thing, or im going to make a numpty out of myself, but im only shy to either people i dont know, or girls which i hardly ever talk to, im ok if a person talks to me though, its just i can never think of anything to say, im crap at beginning subjects

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

I’m pretty shy too, and don’t talk much outside my group of friends.

But I’m shy because I have a much deeper voice than most people my age, and used to get picked on a lot for it in elementary school. People don’t really say much about it anymore, but I’m still shy.

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

try and remember that other people also feel shyness, but they just hid it
just swallow your shyness and talk normally

and dont use alchohol, you will end up thinking you need it to talk to people, then you will end up another doley, spare-changing down at the post office

Read full topic

im quite shy too, i am doing dance at the moment to help me get through this, because i also have to perform infront of loads of people, and it has helped me alot since i have took dance as a gcse

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

I have the same problem but i dont drink and i am getting over it… in elementary school i wouldnt talk to anyone i didnt know now i talk to almost anyone.

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Everytime you are around the people who you feel shy with, think of them as they were someone else. Think of them as they are those people who you don’t feel shy around. That worked for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Shyness
item.dc:creator: @The_Cursed The Cursed
item.description:
@The_Cursed wrote:

MybJames:

and you drink alchohol? Shame on you. Alcohol doesn’t get rid of the problem, it usually is the problem. And you should be less shy if you are in a group!

alcohoh isnt the problem, shyness is.
im 14 , drinking and smoking , so what?(i quit smoking though)
i should be less shy in a group? isnt it the opposite?

Read full topic
